column4: Empoy: to troubleshoot, ask - can I record smooth video to my pc. If yes, its something to do with the app or your connection
If its the app or the connection, find out if the app is saturating your upload
thanks for the tip. I did try cheese. It works awesome. I just can't figure why I get a blank screen on yahoo messenger. It's hard to teach my old folks new apps like skype, emphaty and pidgin
